If "Yes" the OrderDesc of the TransferObject will contain a String defined in paymentOperatorTestString instead of order data. This is needed for handling test data on Computop PaymentGate server side.
Should contain a string like this: Test:0000 where 0000 can be replaced with a different number (must be 4 digits long) which represents an error code.
If "Yes" responses are processed also if they are unencrypted. This is for debugging reasons and should NOT be enabled on live systems.

若你选择基于时间扣款则信用卡扣款时间段强制以小时方式呈现（三位数）

If set to "No", 3D Secure verification is skipped, even if the card is enrolled for 3D Secure.
If "Yes" the customer / customer address data will be added to request

attribute-definition.display-name: Amount used for credit card authorization in "My Account"
attribute-definition.description: If "paymentOperatorCustomerProfileCreditCardAuthorizeRequired" is "Yes", this fractionless amount ($1.00 = 100, $0.01 = 1) will be used for credit card authorization in "My Account".

attribute-definition.display-name: Authorize required for credit card verification in "My Account"
attribute-definition.description: If "Yes", the customer's credit card will be authorized with a given amount before adding it to his account
